sys_decision_multi_result.label: Result: Maintain & Review - It is recommended to ensure that this customisation is fully documented and there is a defined support group for this function. It is worth reviewing Out of the box functionality within ServiceNow, to see if this feature can be moved into a ServiceNow supported method.
